channel.title: resource on PR
channel.description: Recent content in resource on PR

item.title: mclock - Additional clock application for mac menu bar
item.description: Update (2016-01-20): The app is now available on Mac App store. Additional menu clock for your Mac. A minimalist clock to display time of different timezone of your choice.

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: Wallpaper - Testflight app
item.description: I really liked the background image pattern used in testflightapp.com. It is so cool that I have replaced my all time favorite iPad-Safari-fabric texture to gray varient given below.

item.title: Recommended Git workflow
item.description: I recently started using Git as my revision control tool. Impressed by the use of branching and merging, I create and merge a lot of branches.

item.title: Desktop Notification with Html5
item.description: I’ve recently stumbled upon studio.html5rocks.com and found the cool trick to display desktop notifications like Gmail. ![](/assets/Screen shot 2011-05-31 at 7.

item.title: Enter into / Exit from Recovery mode for iPhone
item.description: Yes, every post you come across suggest the same thing, hold your power button and home button for X seconds. Though it is true, unfortunately I had a couple of situations my iphone doesn’t respond to the key combinations.

item.title: Capture screenshot of the app with iPad simulator
item.description: Until recently I was not aware of the shortcut _Ctrl + Cmd + C _ It captures the complete content of the iPad simulator to the clipboard, You can save it to a file by File -> New from Clipboard with preview.

item.title: Idea Vault: Tile this!
item.description: Update: Check the extension and more information @ Idea to action: Tile this I was recently hunting images for a sample design.

item.title: iPad wallpaper for minimalist
item.description: Here is the background image I am using for my iPad. It is looking gorgeous on Home screen. Looks good on both orientations.
